title: Top Places to visit in Pedana, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Pedana is a municipality and the headquarters of Pedana Mandal under the Machilipatnam revenue division of Krishna district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located at a distance of 8 km (5.0 mi) from the district headquarters, Machilipatnam.

 

Geography

Pedana is located at 16.2667°N 81.1667°E. It has an average elevation of 0.5 meters (3 feet).

 

Demographics

As of the 2001 India census, Pedana Municipality had a population of 30,835. Males constitute 50% of the population and females 50%. Pedana has an average literacy rate of 60%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 66%, and female literacy is 54%. In Pedana, 12% of the population under 6 years of age. This municipality was constituted in 1985 with 17 revenue wards and 20 election wards. Now, this municipality has 23 election wards.

 

Governance

Civic administration

 

Pedana municipality was formed in the year 1985. It is a III–Grade Municipality with 23 wards and spread over an area of 20.72 km2 (8.00 sq mi).

 

Transport

The town is well connected to many towns and cities by means of rail and road transport. The town has a total road length of 76.12 km (47.30 mi). NH 216 passes through the town which connects Digamarru and Ongole. Pedana railway station is classified as a D–category stations in the Vijayawada railway division of South Central Railway zone.

 

Economy

Handloom weaving is one of the main occupations of the town. They also use the Kalamkari technique, a type of block printing using natural dyes onto cotton and Silk Fabric/Saree.

 

Education

The primary and secondary school education is imparted by government, aided and private schools, under the School Education Department of the state. The medium of instruction followed by different schools are English, Telugu

 

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pedana

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Dhone, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content:
Dhone or Dronachalam is a town in Kurnool district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a Municipality located in Dhone Mandal.

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content: Anantapur (officially:Anantapuramu) is a city in Anantapur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh.
